Uses of Package
com.viaoa.web

  • Packages that use com.viaoa.web 
    Package Description
    com.viaoa.web
    HTML Ajax components and functionality for web page development.
  • Classes in com.viaoa.web used by com.viaoa.web 
    Class and Description
    OAApplication
    Application level object.
    OABase
    base class used by OAForm, OASession, OAApplication, for storing objects and messages.
    OAButton
    Used to control an html button show/hide enable ajax submit option forward url
    OAButton.ButtonCommand 
    OAButton.ButtonEnabledMode 
    OAButtonList 
    OACheckBox
    Controls an html input type=checkbox bind to hub, property show/hide, that can be bound to property enabled, that can be bound to property ajax submit on change
    OACombo
    Controls html select+options bind to hub, property show/hide, that can be bound to property enabled, that can be bound to property ajax submit on change handle required validation recursive, displayed using indentation option to set the null description
    OADialog
    Create a dialog out of Html element.
    OAFileInput 
    OAForm
    Controls an html form and it's components Form submission support for multipart messages, errorMessage, hiddenMessages default forwardUrl send script to page (addScript) manage ajax or regular submit calls each component 3 times on submission: before, beforeOnSubmit, onSubmit, getReturn js script
    OAForm.Type 
    OAGrid
    Grid component that will scroll equal sized cells.
    OAHtmlAttribute
    Used to set the Attribute value of an Html Element.
    OAHtmlElement
    Used to control any html element: hide or show html text: min/max line width, max rows to display click event: ajax or form submit forward URL: to act as a link helper methods to set attributes see #setConvertTextToHtml(boolean) set to false if text is already in html
    OAHtmlSelect
    Used for an HTML select.
    OAImage
    Controls an html img "src" attribute, to use from a property.
    OAJspComponent
    Interface used for implementing JSP controls, to be contained by OAForm.
    OAJspRequirementsInterface 
    OALabel 
    OALink
    Component for managing html links.
    OAList 
    OAPassword
    Component for managing html password textfield.
    OAPopup
    turn an html element into a popup.
    OAPopupList
    used to popup an OAList when an html component is clicked.
    OARadio
    Controls an html input type=radio bind to hub, property show/hide, that can be bound to property enabled, that can be bound to property ajax submit on change
    OAServletImage
    Controls an html img "src" attribute, to use an image using the ImageSerlvet Example: if image is in object Employee.ImageStore.bytes OAImage(hubEmployee, Employee.P_EmpImageStore); this will change the <img src=".."> to use the "/servlet/img" url Note: to make responsive, set the max-height: 100%
    OASession
    Object used by one user session.
    OATable
    Ajax table component, supports binding, editors, custom event handling.
    OATableColumn
    Used to add a column to a OATable.
    OATableComponent
    Interface that defines the behavior for OATableComponents to work with an OATable.
    OATableEditor
    Used by components that can be an OATable column editor.
    OATablePager
    OATable page control.
    OATextArea
    TextArea component that can bind html textarea to OA.
    OATextField
    Controls an html input type=text, bind to OA hub, using property path set size, maxwidth show/hide, that can be bound to property enabled, that can be bound to property ajax submit on change handle required validation input mask support for calendar popup For datetime, date, time formats - use OADateTime formats.
    OATree 
    OATreeNode 
    OATreeTableController 
    OATreeTitleNode
